citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:35am on
Tuesday, February 18, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the doors to the kennel and
residence. The inspector called the number on file and left a message and then waited approximately 30 minutes before
leaving the facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 11:35am on 
Tuesday, February 18, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the doors to the kennel and 
residence. The inspector called the number on file and left a message and then waited approximately 30 minutes before 
leaving the facility. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the 
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
